00020 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 XLecroyDSO::XLecroyDSO(const char *name, bool runtime,
00022            const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00023            const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00024            const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00025            const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00026     XCharDeviceDriver<XDSO>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers) {
00027     const char* ch[] = {"C1", "C2", "C3", "C4", "M1", "M2", "M3", "M4", 0L};
00028     for(int i = 0; ch[i]; i++) {
00029         trace1()->add(ch[i]);
00030         trace2()->add(ch[i]);
00031         trace3()->add(ch[i]);
00032         trace4()->add(ch[i]);
00033     }
00034     const char* sc[] = {"0.02", "0.05", "0.1", "0.2", "0.5", "1", "2", "5", "10",
00035                         "20", "50", "100", 0L};
00036     for(int i = 0; sc[i]; i++)
00037     {
00038         vFullScale1()->add(sc[i]);
00039         vFullScale2()->add(sc[i]);
00040         vFullScale3()->add(sc[i]);
00041         vFullScale4()->add(sc[i]);
00042     }
00043     const char* tr[] = {"C1", "C2", "C3", "C4", "LINE", "EX", "EX10", "PA", "ETM10", 0L};
00044     for(int i = 0; tr[i]; i++)
00045     {
00046         trigSource()->add(tr[i]);
00047     }
00048 
00049     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeWrite(20); //20msec
00050     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeSPoll(10); //10msec
00051     interface()->setEOS("\n");
00052 
00053     recordLength()->value(10000);
00054 }
00055 
00056 void
00057 XLecroyDSO::open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00058 {
00059     interface()->send("COMM_HEADER OFF");
00060     interface()->send("COMM_FORMAT DEF9,WORD,BIN");
00061     //LSB first for litte endian.
00062     interface()->send("COMM_ORDER LO");
00063     onAverageChanged(average());
00064 
00065     start();
00066 }
00067 void 
00068 XLecroyDSO::onTrace1Changed(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) {
00069     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00070     XString ch = trace1()->to_str();
00071     if(!ch.empty()) {
00072         interface()->sendf("%s:TRACE ON", ch.c_str());
00073     }
00074     onAverageChanged(average());
00075 }

00082     }
00083     onAverageChanged(average());

00103 void
00104 XLecroyDSO::onAverageChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) {
00105     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00106     interface()->send("TRIG_MODE STOP");
00107     int avg = *average();
00108     avg = std::max(1, avg);
00109     bool sseq = *singleSequence();
00110     if(avg == 1) {
00111 //      interface()->send("F1:TRACE OFF");
00112 //      interface()->send("F2:TRACE OFF");
00113         if(sseq) {
00114             interface()->send("ARM");
00115         }
00116         else {
00117             interface()->send("TRIG_MODE NORM");            
00118         }
00119     }
00120     else {
00121 //      const char *atype = sseq ? "SUMMED" : "CONTINUOUS";
00122         const char *atype = sseq ? "AVGS" : "AVGC";
00123         XString ch = trace1()->to_str();
00124         if(!ch.empty()) {
00125 //          interface()->sendf("TA:DEFINE EQN,'AVG(%s)',AVGTYPE,%s,SWEEPS,%d",
00126 //              ch.c_str(), atype, avg);
00127             interface()->sendf("TA:DEFINE EQN,'%s(%s)',SWEEPS,%d",
00128                 atype, ch.c_str(), avg);
00129             interface()->send("TA:TRACE ON");
00130         }
00131         ch = trace2()->to_str();
00132         if(!ch.empty()) {
00133             interface()->sendf("TB:DEFINE EQN,'%s(%s)',SWEEPS,%d",
00134                 atype, ch.c_str(), avg);
00135             interface()->send("TB:TRACE ON");
00136         }
00137         interface()->send("TRIG_MODE NORM");
00138         ch = trace3()->to_str();
00139         if(!ch.empty()) {
00140             interface()->sendf("TB:DEFINE EQN,'%s(%s)',SWEEPS,%d",
00141                 atype, ch.c_str(), avg);
00142             interface()->send("TB:TRACE ON");
00143         }
00144         interface()->send("TRIG_MODE NORM");
00145         ch = trace4()->to_str();
00146         if(!ch.empty()) {
00147             interface()->sendf("TB:DEFINE EQN,'%s(%s)',SWEEPS,%d",
00148                 atype, ch.c_str(), avg);
00149             interface()->send("TB:TRACE ON");
00150         }
00151         interface()->send("TRIG_MODE NORM");
00152     }
00153 }

00156 XLecroyDSO::onSingleChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node) {
00157     onAverageChanged(node);

00233 void
00234 XLecroyDSO::onForceTriggerTouched(const shared_ptr<XNode> &) {
00235     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00236     //  interface()->send("FORCE_TRIGER");
00237     if((*average() <= 1) && *singleSequence()) {
00238         interface()->send("ARM");
00239     }
00240     else {
00241         interface()->send("TRIG_MODE NORM");
00242     }
00243 }
00244 
00245 void
00246 XLecroyDSO::startSequence() {
00247     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00248     if((*average() <= 1) && *singleSequence())
00249         interface()->send("ARM");
00250     else
00251         interface()->send("TRIG_MODE NORM");
00252     interface()->send("CLEAR_SWEEPS");
00253 }
00254 
00255 int
00256 XLecroyDSO::acqCount(bool *seq_busy) {
00257     bool sseq = *singleSequence();
00258     unsigned int n = 0;
00259     int avg = *average();
00260     avg = std::max(1, avg);
00261     if(!trace1()->to_str().empty()) {
00262         interface()->queryf("%s:TRACE?", trace1()->to_str().c_str());
00263         if(!strncmp(&interface()->buffer()[0], "ON", 2)) {
00264             //trace1 is displayed.
00265             XString ch = (avg > 1) ? XString("TA") : trace1()->to_str();
00266             n = lrint(inspectDouble("SWEEPS_PER_ACQ", ch));
00267         }
00268     }
00269     if(!sseq || (avg < 2)) {
00270         interface()->query("INR?");
00271         if(interface()->toInt() & 1) {
00272             if(!sseq)
00273                 m_totalCount++;
00274             else
00275                 n = 1;
00276         }
00277         if(!sseq)
00278             n = m_totalCount;
00279     }
00280     *seq_busy = (n < avg);
00281     return n;
00282 }
00283 
00284 double
00285 XLecroyDSO::inspectDouble(const char *req, const XString &trace) {
00286     interface()->queryf("%s:INSPECT? '%s'", trace.c_str(), req);
00287     double x;
00288     interface()->scanf("\"%*s : %lf", &x);
00289     return x;
00290 }

00292 double
00293 XLecroyDSO::getTimeInterval() {
00294     return inspectDouble("HORIZ_INTERVAL", trace1()->to_str());
00295 }
00296 
00297 void
00298 XLecroyDSO::getWave(std::deque<XString> &channels)
00299 {
00300     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00301 //  interface()->send("TRIG_MODE STOP");
00302     try {
00303         push<unsigned int32_t>(channels.size());
00304         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < std::min((unsigned int)channels.size(), 4u); i++) {
00305             XString ch = channels[i];
00306             if(*average() > 1) {
00307                 const char *fch[] = {"TA", "TB", "TC", "TD"};
00308                 ch = fch[i];
00309             }
00310             interface()->sendf("%s:WAVEFORM? ALL", ch.c_str());
00311             msecsleep(50);
00312             interface()->receive(4); //For "ALL,"
00313             if(interface()->buffer().size() != 4)
00314                 throw XInterface::XCommError(i18n("Invalid waveform"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00315             interface()->setGPIBUseSerialPollOnRead(false);
00316             interface()->receive(2); //For "#9"
00317             if(interface()->buffer().size() != 2)
00318                 throw XInterface::XCommError(i18n("Invalid waveform"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00319             rawData().insert(rawData().end(), 
00320                              interface()->buffer().begin(), interface()->buffer().end());
00321             unsigned int n;
00322             interface()->scanf("#%1u", &n);
00323             interface()->receive(n);
00324             if(interface()->buffer().size() != n)
00325                 throw XInterface::XCommError(i18n("Invalid waveform"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00326             rawData().insert(rawData().end(), 
00327                              interface()->buffer().begin(), interface()->buffer().end());
00328             int blks = interface()->toUInt();
00329             XTime tstart = XTime::now();
00330             for(int retry = 0;; retry++) {
00331                 interface()->receive(blks);
00332                 blks -= interface()->buffer().size();
00333                 rawData().insert(rawData().end(), 
00334                                  interface()->buffer().begin(), interface()->buffer().end());
00335                 if(blks <= 0)
00336                     break;
00337                 if(XTime::now() - tstart > 3.0)
00338                     break; //timeout.
00339                 msecsleep(20);
00340             }
00341             if(blks != 0)
00342                 throw XInterface::XCommError(i18n("Invalid waveform"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00343             interface()->receive(); //For LF.
00344             interface()->setGPIBUseSerialPollOnRead(true);
00345         }
00346     }
00347     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError &e) {
00348         interface()->setGPIBUseSerialPollOnRead(true);
00349         throw e;
00350     }
00351 //  if(!*singleSequence())
00352 //      interface()->send("TRIG_MODE NORM");
00353 }
00354 void
00355 XLecroyDSO::convertRaw() throw (XRecordError&) {
00356 #define WAVEDESC_WAVE_ARRAY_COUNT 116
00357 #define DATA_BLOCK 346
00358     
00359     unsigned int ch_cnt = pop<unsigned int32_t>();
00360     for(unsigned int ch = 0; ch < ch_cnt; ch++) {
00361         std::vector<char>::iterator dit = rawDataPopIterator();
00362         unsigned int n;
00363         sscanf(&*dit, "#%1u", &n);
00364         dit += n + 2;
00365         if(strncmp(&*dit, "WAVEDESC", 8)) {
00366             throw XRecordError(i18n("Invalid waveform"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00367         }
00368         dit += DATA_BLOCK;
00369         rawDataPopIterator() += WAVEDESC_WAVE_ARRAY_COUNT + n + 2;
00370         int32_t count = pop<int32_t>();
00371         pop<int32_t>();
00372         int32_t first_valid = pop<int32_t>();
00373         int32_t last_valid = pop<int32_t>();
00374         int32_t first = pop<int32_t>();
00375         pop<int32_t>();
00376         pop<int32_t>();
00377         pop<int32_t>();
00378         int32_t acqcount = pop<int32_t>();
00379         pop<int16_t>();
00380         pop<int16_t>();
00381         float vgain = pop<float>();
00382         float voffset = pop<float>();
00383         pop<float>();
00384         pop<float>();
00385         pop<int16_t>();
00386         pop<int16_t>();
00387         float interval = pop<float>();
00388         double hoffset = pop<double>();
00389         
00390         fprintf(stderr, "first_valid=%d,last_valid=%d,first=%d,acqcount=%d,count=%d\n",
00391             (int)first_valid, (int)last_valid, (int)first, (int)acqcount, (int)count);
00392         if(ch == 0) {
00393             if((count < 0) || 
00394                 (rawData().size() < (count * 2 + DATA_BLOCK + n + 2) * ch_cnt))
00395                 throw XBufferUnderflowRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00396             setParameters(ch_cnt, hoffset, interval, count);
00397         }
00398         
00399         double *wave = waveDisp(ch);
00400         rawDataPopIterator() = dit;
00401         for(int i = 0; i < std::min(count, (int32_t)lengthDisp()); i++) {
00402             int16_t x = pop<int16_t>();
00403             float v = voffset + vgain * x;
00404             *wave++ = v;
00405         }
00406     }
00407 }
